welcome_msg.title: üëã Welcome to **NativeMind**
welcome_msg.body:
NativeMind is a privacy-first AI browser extension that helps you chat, search, and translate ‚Äî all powered by on-device language models.

Here‚Äôs what you can do with NativeMind:


- Chat across multiple tabs to keep track of different pages.
- Search the web directly within the chat for more context.
- Right-click to translate any part of the page instantly.
- Switch or download models anytime in Settings.

You can start by trying out the quick actions below.

errors.unknown_error: üòÖ Something unexpected happened. Please try again!
errors.model_request_error: ü§ñ Unable to connect to AI. Please check your settings and try again.
errors.model_not_found: üîç AI model not found. Please check your model selection in settings.
errors.model_request_timeout: ‚è±Ô∏è Request is taking too long. Try shortening your message or starting a new chat.
errors.rate_limit_error: ‚è±Ô∏è You've hit the rate limit! Please wait a moment before sending another message, or consider upgrading your OpenRouter plan for higher limits.
errors.timeout_error: ‚è±Ô∏è This is taking longer than expected. Please try again.
errors.webllm_not_supported: ‚ùå This feature isn't supported on your device.

popup.reload_page: Please reload the page to use NativeMind.
popup.page_not_supported: This page is not supported by NativeMind.
popup.local_pdf_file_not_supported: Due to browser permission limitations, we cannot directly access local files on your computer. Please open the plugin in another browser tab and manually upload the local PDF file.
